name: Flash Fire
components: V, S, M (a pinch of powdered fool’s gold)
text: The firearm fires with a blinding flash, even if the firearm is not currently loaded. Every creature within 15 feet of the creature carrying the weapon must succeed at a Fortitude save or be blinded for 1d4 rounds. The creature carrying the firearm takes a –4 penalty on this saving throw. If the firearm is loaded, the ammunition is wasted.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料 (一撮黄铁矿粉末)
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (物体, 见文本)
text_zh:
目标火器会立刻开火，伴随着炫目的闪光，即使这把火器并未装填。

火器持有者附近15尺范围内的生物必须通过一次强韧检定，否则会失明1d4轮。火器持有者本人在这次检定中有-4罚值。

如果火器已装填，弹药被浪费。
